ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: On Fri, 25 Jun 1999, John Cynkar wrote: Be a little realistic man.  You need a strong group of 30+ s to get the demon claw or a massive amount of cash to buy
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 25 Jun 1999, John Cynkar wrote:

Be a little realistic man. You need a strong group of 30+'s to get the
demon claw or a massive amount of cash to buy it from someone. 99% of us
can't do either option. Don't brag about your twinkness unless you can
benefit us, because i'm not sure about the rest of the people on the
message board, but i'm disgusted by all the rich, twinked chars.

Frizzan Z`ress (Bloodstone Templars)
Indigo Brotherhood 21st Level

> At lvl 17 my favorite setup is a Demonclaw (5,19), and my combine LS(6,28 or so), now all I have to do is sell my full bronze an buy meself a PGT...
>
